title: Navratna Kundanalu: Timeless Gemstone Stud Earrings
materials: and Cat's Eye (Vaiduryam). Set with Polki Diamonds. High-quality
Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: A classic South Indian design, each earring showcases a floral arrangement of the nine sacred gemstones (Navratnas) meticulously arranged for maximum astrological benefit and aesthetic appeal. The centerpiece gemstone is surrounded by a delicate cluster of Polki diamonds, adding brilliance and dimension. The setting is designed to enhance the unique beauty and healing properties of each gemstone, reflecting traditional Telugu craftsmanship.
colors: Multicolor - Rich jewel tones of red
brown and grey. The golden glow of the 22K gold setting enhances the vibrancy of the Navratnas.
occasions: Perfect for auspicious occasions like weddings (Vivah)
and traditional ceremonies like Seemantham and Half-Saree Functions. Also suitable for adding a touch of elegance to modern formal events.
description: This Navratna Kundanalu is not just a piece of jewelry; it's a symbol of prosperity, health, and good fortune. Handcrafted by skilled artisans using time-honored techniques, each gemstone is carefully selected for its quality and astrological significance. A treasured heirloom to be passed down through generations, these earrings offer a blend of traditional South Indian heritage and exquisite craftsmanship.
